title: President accords approval to Tessoriâ€™s appointment as Governor Sindh
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 9 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi has accorded his approval to the appointment of Kamran Khan Tessori as Governor Sindh.
The president approved his appointment under Article 101 (1) of the Constitution, President Secretariat Press Wing said in a press release on Sunday.
The office of Governor Sindh was lying vacant after the resignation of former governor Imran Ismail.
